text: The rumour : Meghan Markle had a secret first husband Where you heard it : The National Enquirer The report : Markle ’ s status as divorcée has never been in dispute, but according to a new “ bombshell ” Enquirer cover story ( is there any other kind? ), Prince Harry will be the ex - actress ’ s third kick at the matrimonial can. “ How she HID PAST from Husband No. 2! ” claims one scandalous cover line, referring to “ Man - eater Meghan ’ s ” ex Trevor Engelson. Inside, an unnamed source explains how Harry was “ blindsided ” by the news, which has been kept secret until now ( per the NE ), thanks to a “ hush - hush annulment.
